meanings.definition: Antipruritics: substances that relieve or prevent itching
meanings.sent1: The antipruritics in the lotion helped soothe my itchy skin.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend antipruritics to alleviate itching caused by allergies.
meanings.sent3: I applied the antipruritics cream and felt like a superhero defeating the itch villain.
meanings.sent4: Her calming presence acted as antipruritics to the restless minds in the room.
meanings.sent5: The antipruritics spray worked like magic, instantly stopping the annoying itch.

meanings.definition: Antipruritics: medications used to treat itching
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antipruritics to help with the persistent itching.
meanings.sent2: Some antipruritics may cause drowsiness as a side effect.
meanings.sent3: The antipruritics pills were so effective, they almost made itching seem like a distant memory.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as antipruritics to her emotional wounds, soothing the pain.
meanings.sent5: The antipruritics ointment provided instant relief, calming the irritated skin.
